con-remove-vary.reason: Condition 2 requiring natural stone cladding is no longer feasible due to cost and supply issues. Alternative materials would achieve the same visual effect.
con-remove-vary.condition-change: Replace condition 2 requiring natural stone with: 'The external walls shall be clad in high-quality reconstituted stone or approved equivalent material to match the existing building appearance, subject to sample approval by the Local Planning Authority.'
